102-148a @#/ /'phags pa par+N+Na sha pa ri'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bA ma ne traM na ma s+ya mi twa na ma s+yA mi bA ma ne/ b+ha ga ba te bi shA tsi/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ bi shA tsi pA sha pa r+shud+hA ri NI/ yA ni kA ni tsi da b+ha yA n+yA tA d+yaM te yaH/ kA tsi da mA ra yo/ yaHkA tsid ma hA mA ra yo/ ye ke tsi da u ba d+Na bAHye ke tsid u pA yA sA / ye ke tsid a b+h+yA d+mi kA b+ha yA/ ye ke tsi da u pa sar+g+ga u pa sar+g+ga saM bad d+ha bA/ uh+ba d+yan+te/ sarbA ni tA ni/ sarba sta/ sarbi ta bA la tA e bot+ba d+yan+te/ na baN+Di ta taH/ ta da ne nas t+ye nas t+ya pa tsa ne nas t+ya pA ba ke na/ tad+ya thA/ oM dzaHdzAHdzaHdzAH/ e b+hi ShaHpaN+Di ta a d+hi Sh+Shi tai ra man+t+ra pa dai ra/ ma ma sarba sa twA nA na tsa/ rak+ShaM ku ru pa ri trA NaM ku ru/ pa ri gra haM ku ru/ pa ri pA la naM ku ru/ shAn+tiM ku ru swa stA ya naM ku ru/ daN+Na pa ri hA raM ku ru/ sha stA pa ri hA raM ku ru/

296
102-148b yA bad bi Sha d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/ ag+ni pa ri hA raM ku ru/ u da ka pa ri hA raM ku ru/ ka khorda ts+tshe da naM ku ru/ sI mA ban+d+haM ku ru/ d+ha ra NI pan+d+haM ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mi te a mi te/ a mi tod+d+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ A shwa ste/ A shwa stAM ge /mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra/ sham bra sham/ u pa sa ma sarba bya d+hI nu pas ma sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu nu pa sa ma sarba na k+Sha tra gra ha do Sh+Na nu pa sa ma sarba daM Sh+TI NAM tsau ba sa ma/ b+ha ga pa ti/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ t+yuM na t+yuM na/ bit+yuM na bi t+yuM na/ tu na tu na/ tu mu le swA hA/ oM gau ri gan+d+ha rI tsau rI tsaN+Da li mA taM gi buk+kA si swA hA/ na maHsarba sha ba rA NAM/ ma hA sha ba rA NAM/ b+ha ga ba ti bi shA tsi bar+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ oM bi shA tsi bar+N+Na sha ba ri hrIHha hU~M phaT pi shA ci swA hA/ oM aM ku re maM ku re/ ku ra re par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ gnag nad la srad bu byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la/ de'i rjes la nad pa 'am/ rta dang ba lang la sogs pa la glos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te de'i mgo la bcings na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma he dang ra lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la yang lhas su bri bar bya'o/ /bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snga dro phyugs kyi lhas su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te/ bum pa sar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags te/ phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs gzugs shing / rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa gi'u wang gis bris te/ rta babs kyi khar gdags so/ /de nas phyugs thams cad gzas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo nas gzung ngo / /gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas mi bzhis chus gtor na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad

297
102-149a dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/ /stag gis 'jigs pa la dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o/ /chu srin gyis 'jigs pa la mda' dang pha gu la sngags na sbrul dang / byi ba dang / sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngor thal ba la sngags te/ spyi bo dang mgul du byugs na mtshon cha zlog par byed do/ /skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing ngo / /bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags pas khrus bya'o/ /lag pas sku dpal bzlas nas bcing ngo / /de nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /yul bskor te dril bu dang / rnga dang / dung la bzlas pa byas na bgegs thams cad 'byer te gnod pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs gzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra 'am g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs so//
